other_tests.findings: Yeasts and Pseudomonas were isolated from the culture.
Scanty purulent tan secretions, slight reddening of both main bronchi, erythema and edema of more distal airways, and streaks of blood in the lingular airways.
Normal left ventricular function, right ventricular dilatation, and moderate tricuspid regurgitation; calculated pulmonary-artery systolic pressure was 53 to 60 mm Hg.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The rhythm reverted to normal spontaneously, but atrial fibrillation recurred intermittently thereafter.

other_tests.findings: Consolidation in the right middle lobe and multifocal lucent areas consistent with cavitation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The previously observed consolidation progressed to multiple areas of cavitation.

other_tests.findings: Diffuse polymorphous infiltrate of inflammatory cells with necrotizing granulomatous inflammation; some airways plugged by entangled masses of Aspergillus hyphae.
